message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you thinking of my needs.  While $900000 is a good starting point, I'm hoping to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $825000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business and personal life.
